name: Gecko Moria
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: On Play: If your Leader has the (Thriller Bark Pirates) type, play up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less from your trash rested. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
